header.name: Renhui Zhou
header.title: UI/UX Developer
header.bio: UI/UX developer with 3+ years of experience in React.js and Material UI, delivering modern, responsive, and user-focused web applications. Experienced in UI/UX design, component libraries, and agile team collaboration. Passionate about creating seamless user experiences and optimizing application performance.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a UI/UX developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in React.js and Material UI. I'm passionate about creating modern, responsive, and user-focused web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

My journey in tech started with a Master's degree in Software System Engineering from UTS, and I've since worked with various companies, from startups to established businesses, helping them build robust applications and internal tools.

I have a strong background in both frontend development and UI/UX design, with experience in component libraries, agile development, and cross-functional team collaboration. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and optimize application performance.

timeline.title: Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: Investigated and resolved issues reported by users, ensuring minimal downtime and smooth system performance. Delivered enhancements and new features based on client requests, demonstrating strong communication and problem-solving skills. Maintenance of back-end including back-end migration.

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Developed internal trading administration systems by troubleshooting user issues, maintaining dashboards, and ensuring stable system performance. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve technical problems, implement upgrades, and deliver secure, reliable solutions. Built and maintained internal tools and component libraries, reducing repetitive work and supporting colleagues with consistent resources.

timeline.title: Full-stack Developer Intern
timeline.description: Assisted with troubleshooting and optimizing database queries, improving application performance and reducing errors. Participated in sprint planning and agile development to ensure timely delivery of features.

timeline.title: IT Support Technician
timeline.description: Installed and maintained PCs, software, and network hardware; provided user-friendly IT support. Gained practical troubleshooting experience for hardware/software issues, supporting user-facing systems. Delivered clear, customer-friendly technical support for login issues, software errors, and device problems.
